p: ARR is produced mainly in Liaoning province, Jilin province, and Shaanxi province, China. According to the existing research reports, the content of the six compounds in volatile of ARR evaluated in this study are shown in Table 1 ( Liu and Liu 2010, Du et al. 2011, Wu 2011, Wang et al. 2014, Wang et al. 2020), and the source of pure compounds are shown in Table 2. Eucarvone was dissolved in acetone and the other five compounds were dissolved in n-hexane. All reagents used were of analytical grade.
